dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3585 IH: PUMP Technical Correction Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Morelle (for himself, Ms. Sewell, Mr. Kilmer, and Mrs. Torres of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Congressional Accountability Act of 1995 to expand access to breastfeeding accommodations in the workplace.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the PUMP Technical Correction Act.

section.header: Breastfeeding accommodation coverage for certain congressional employees
section.text: Section 203(a)(1) of the Congressional Accountability Act of 1995 (2 U.S.C. 1313(a)(1)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking and section 12(c) and inserting section 12(c), and section 18D; and
